attributes.action: Make the aniversary of the battle of Waterloo a public holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we are slowly approaching the 200th anniversary of the Battle of Waterloo. It would be fit to commemorate this point, not just in British history but in European history. Celebrating what was an important event which no doubt help shape England, and the future of europe and the world.
